entry.tran: 有风度的;时尚的;有格调的;优雅的
entry.def: Someone or something that is stylish is smart, elegant, and fashionable.

example.ex: ...a very attractive and very stylish woman of 27.
example.tran: 气质迷人、格调高雅的 27 岁女子

means.word_mean: 1. having elegance or taste or refinement in manners or dress;

sentences.sentence: "a little less posh but every bit as stylish as Lord Peter Wimsey"

means.word_mean: 2. being or in accordance with current fashion;
